item.title: 中国的 WeRide 据说将在美国 IPO 和配售中融资 4.405 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国自动驾驶汽车公司 WeRide Inc. 已从两次推迟的美国首次公开募股和同时进行的私募中筹集到 4.405 亿美元。【原文：Chinese self-driving automotive company WeRide Inc. has raised $440.5 million from its twice-delayed US initial public offering and concurrent private placement, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国经济刺激政策为各大银行定调，汇丰全力以赴进行改革
item.description: 中国最近为振兴经济而采取的刺激措施将为中国主要贷款机构的第三季度盈利定下基调，这些机构包括中国工商银行股份有限公司、中国建设银行股份有限公司、中国农业银行股份有限公司和中国银行股份有限公司。【原文：China’s recent stimulus measures to revive the economy will set the tone for third-quarter earnings from major Chinese lenders including Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd., China Construction Bank Corp., Agricultural Bank of China Ltd. and Bank of China Ltd.】

item.title: 印度债券外流凸显掉期交易平仓的影响
item.description: 印度符合指数要求的债券将出现自 4 月份以来的首次月度资金外流，原因是外国人退出了用于获得该国 1.3 万亿美元主权债务市场风险敞口的掉期交易。【原文：India’s index-eligible bonds are headed for their first monthly outflow since April, as foreigners exit a swap trade used to gain exposure to the country’s $1.3 trillion sovereign debt market.】

item.title: 创纪录缩表后中国暂不下调政策利率
item.description: 中国央行维持一年期政策利率不变，一个月前的融资成本降幅创下历史之最，这表明中国政府正在谨慎地推进货币刺激政策，以支持经济。【原文：China’s central bank kept its one-year policy rate unchanged, after slashing funding costs by the most on record a month ago, suggesting authorities are cautiously pacing monetary stimulus to support the economy.】

item.title: Aware Super、德兰西将投资 10 亿英镑建造伦敦顶级写字楼
item.description: Aware Super 和 Delancey Real Estate 已联手向英国房地产投资 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元），目标是伦敦市中心的高端写字楼。【原文：Aware Super and Delancey Real Estate have teamed up to invest 1 billion pounds ($1.3 billion) into UK property, targeting high-end offices in central London.】

item.title: 日本的军事战略支点正在激活 NEC 的国防技术业务
item.description: 面对日益加剧的地缘政治风险，日本电气公司（NEC Corp.【原文：NEC Corp. is riding a wave of growing Japanese defense-related spending in the face of heightened geopolitical risk.】

item.title: 关键融资成本上升，中国银行面临流动性困境
item.description: 中国的银行面临着更大的融资压力，这是货币宽松力度加大的意外后果，它推动了股市上涨，并减少了对债务产品的需求。【原文：Chinese banks are under increased funding pressure, an unintended consequence of increased monetary easing efforts that fueled a stock rally and cut demand for debt products.】

item.title: 比亚迪出口前景是下一阶段逆势上涨 66% 的关键
item.description: 由于市场已经预期中国汽车制造商比亚迪股份有限公司的销售额将创下新高，因此需要一个令人信服的海外增长故事来刺激其股价继续上涨。【原文：With the market already anticipating record sales from Chinese automaker BYD Co., a convincing overseas growth story will be needed to spur the next leg of its peer-beating stock rally.】

item.title: 投资者等待回购结果，韩国锌业大幅上涨
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）继上一交易日大涨 30% 后，周五进一步攀升，市场正在等待董事长崔润范（Choi Yun-beom）为抵御 125 亿美元收购要约而发起的股票回购的结果。【原文：Korea Zinc Co. climbed even higher on Friday, following a 30% jump in the previous session, as the market waited for the results of a stock buyback launched by Chairman Choi Yun-beom to fend off a $12.5 billion takeover bid.】

item.title: 新加坡房价降幅低于预期；租金反弹
item.description: 新加坡房价在第三季度的跌幅小于预期，原因是 9 月下旬新房销售的激增缩小了跌幅。【原文：Singapore home prices fell less than estimated in the third quarter, as a spurt of new property sales in late September pared the decline.】

item.title: 大选前美国股市比亚洲股市平静
item.description: 尽管 11 月 5 日大选临近，但与亚太地区的股市相比，美国股市仍是一片平静的绿洲。【原文：US stocks are an oasis of calm compared to those in Asia Pacific despite the approach of the Nov. 5 election, as investor nerves over Chinese stimulus and Japan’s own national vote whipsaw share prices across the region.】

item.title: 名厨有望在韩国上市后获得 1.8 亿美元意外之财
item.description: 一位因 Netflix 热播剧而成名的厨师准备推动韩国艰难的 IPO 市场，他将把自己的连锁餐厅上市，他所持股份的价值可能约为 1.8 亿美元。【原文：A chef made famous by a hit Netflix show is poised to boost South Korea’s struggling IPO market, listing his restaurant chain in a deal that may value his stake at about $180 million.】

item.title: 日本加藤在加大警告力度后与耶伦讨论外汇问题
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信与美国财务大臣珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）讨论了外汇市场的发展。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato discussed developments in the foreign exchange market with US counterpart Janet Yellen a day after he intensified warnings over a rapid slide in the yen.】

item.title: 交易商追踪中东紧张局势，石油连跌两日后趋于平稳
item.description: 石油在连续两日下跌后企稳，交易商继续关注中东地缘政治的发展和供应前景。【原文：Oil steadied after a two-day fall, with traders keeping their focus on geopolitical developments in the Middle East and the outlook for supply.】

item.title: Meta、谷歌和 TikTok 必须面对学校的成瘾指控
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司、谷歌、TikTok 和 Snap 将不得不面对学区在联邦法院提起的诉讼，这些学区指责它们的 "成瘾性 "应用程序导致了学生的心理健康危机。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., Google, TikTok and Snap will have to face lawsuits brought by school districts in federal court blaming their “addictive” apps for contributing to a mental health crisis among students.】

item.title: 首席执行官怀特卸任后，慧科股价反弹
item.description: 慧科全球有限公司（WiseTech Global Ltd.）首席执行官理查德-怀特（Richard White）改任其他职务，以化解有关他与女性交往行为的破坏性指控，此后该公司股价反弹。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. shares rebounded after Chief Executive Officer Richard White shifted to a different role in a bid to defuse damaging allegations about his behavior with women.】

item.title: 日本大选悬而未决，日元和股市面临下跌风险
item.description: 日本执政联盟自 2009 年以来首次面临失去议会下院多数席位的危险，策略师们认为日元和股市会因此下跌。【原文：Japan’s ruling coalition is in danger of losing its majority in the lower house of parliament for the first time since 2009, and strategists see the yen and stocks falling on such an outcome.】

item.title: 微软首席执行官 2024 年获得价值 7,910 万美元的薪酬包
item.description: 微软公司微软公司首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）在2024财年获得了价值7910万美元的薪酬，比上一年增长了63%，因为这家软件制造商正努力扩大其在人工智能工具领域的强势地位。【原文：Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella received a pay package worth $79.1 million for fiscal 2024, a 63% increase from the prior year as the software maker worked to extend its strong position in artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 大众探界者汽车公司增加新的混合动力车型以应对电动车增长放缓的趋势

item.title: 美国股市和债券在 "金鸡独立 "数据的影响下继续攀升：市场综述
item.description: 在特斯拉公司股价跳涨的助推下，华尔街本周首次反弹，亚洲股市已做好准备摆脱美国股市的影响。【原文：Asian equities were primed to shrug off their US peers after Wall Street rallied for the first time this week, helped along by a jump in Tesla Inc. shares.】

item.title: 特朗普 2.0 在投票前困扰世界经济首脑齐聚华盛顿
item.description: 全球金融领袖齐聚华盛顿，表面上是为了讨论技术性问题：债务、通货膨胀、利率。他们真正关心的是唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：The world’s financial leaders are gathered in Washington, ostensibly to discuss technical stuff: debt, inflation, interest rates. What’s really on their minds is Donald Trump.】

item.description: 中国地方债务市场中一个不透明角落的违约率飙升至历史新高，这让那些以为证券有国家隐性担保的投资者陷入困境。【原文：Defaults in an opaque corner of China’s local debt market have surged to a record high, ensnaring investors who’d assumed the securities had an implicit guarantee from the state.】

item.title: 精神航空出售喷气式飞机以增加现金，因为破产的可能性迫在眉睫
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines Inc）同意以 5.19 亿美元的价格出售 23 架空中客车 SE 飞机，这为这家临近可能申请破产的廉价航空公司提供了急需的现金支持。【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. agreed to sell 23 Airbus SE aircraft for $519 million, giving the budget carrier a much-needed cash boost as it nears a possible bankruptcy filing.】

item.title: 受成本影响的金矿企业面临失去金银繁荣的风险
item.description: 黄金价格屡创新高。但全球最大的黄金矿业公司的业绩却令人失望，这预示着这些公司可能正在努力利用炙手可热的需求。【原文：Gold prices are at record highs. But disappointing results at the world’s largest miner of the yellow metal signals companies may be struggling to capitalize on sizzling demand.】

item.title: 股价暴跌，卡普里认沽期权突然走俏
